text:
My boyfriend can definitely help with the groom side of things and will tag team for feedback (he’s a groom artist at mpc and has made some online tuts)


The industry here is so diverse it’s crazy- I’ve had such a crazy job history and have experience extreme ends of spectrum 

I was a coordinator at a small company called Flickerpix in Belfast (where I’m from) and was The only in house production staff (think PITCHING FOR THINGS I SHOUDNT HAVE :joy:)

I worked freelance for LEGO- and for a local gaming company as a modelling/texture artist 

I then spent final year in a solo project- working on modelling, texturing lookdev and lighting

Went back to flickeprix working as their main 3D generalist for the above one a kids pilot 

All the above in Belfast was for minimum wage btw (our industry at home is a bit shit)

Came to London - worked for two weeks at Feed Me Light as a texture artist

Then on to mpc as a departmental assistant (I worked for assets- the people were fantastic and I had an amazing time here)

Then I’m in blue zoo- we’re I’m paid well and treated great
